nodes.text: TTLP soldiers were the paramilitary forces of the Tralus and Talus Liberation Party, a group fighting for the independence of the Double Worlds from the Corellian system. After the Battle of Yavin, they were involved in the robbing of Aqualish graves on Talus.  Around 1 ABY, a spacer working for the Aqualish Omkoo fought and killed several TTLP soldiers at an ancient Aqualish gravesite, in the Nashal Starport and in a weapons depot of the Rebel Alliance in order to retrieve stolen Aqualish artifacts.

TTLP soldiers were a non-player characters in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. TTLP soldiers were added to the game with the quest "Grave Robbers" released with the "Publish 21", on August 4, 2005.
